long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Palet AI: Your Personal Web Memory Assistant

Unlock the power of your browsing experience with Palet AI, the intelligent Chrome extension that transforms how you interact with online content.

Key Features:

1. Effortless Context Saving: As you browse, Palet AI automatically captures and organizes key information from websites you visit.

2. Personal Knowledge Base: Build a comprehensive, easily accessible archive of your online discoveries.

3. AI-Powered Insights: Leverage advanced AI to ask questions about your saved content, gaining deeper understanding and making connections.

4. Seamless Integration: Works quietly in the background, enhancing your browsing without disrupting your workflow.

How It Works:

1. Browse normally - Palet AI works silently to save context.
2. Review your saved information anytime.
3. Ask Palet AI questions about your saved content for instant, personalized answers.
